forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. North northwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds under a clear, sunny sky, promising a day that feels refreshingly crisp and invigorating. A gentle northwest breeze carries a hint of coolness, setting the stage for high temperatures that will dance around the 59-degree mark before softly descending into the afternoon. As the day progresses and the sun bathes the city in its luminous embrace, you might feel the temperature dip slightly, settling into the mid-50s—perfect for a leisurely stroll along the bustling streets, where the vibrancy of city life thrives.

Tonight, the air will turn cooler still, with clear skies and nighttime temperatures grazing the 46-degree point. A north northwest wind will whisper through the streets, its briskness serving as a reminder of the seasonal transition. For those venturing out, light layers—a cozy sweater or a light jacket—will offer comfort without the bulk, ideal for enjoying an evening coffee or catching up with friends over a relaxed meal. With such splendid weather, a visit to a local café or a slow walk by the waterfront could weave delightful threads into your day’s tapestry, while the absence of fog allows the stunning vistas of the Golden Gate and city skyline to be fully appreciated.
